questions.question: Backpack capacity is usually measured in what?
When packing your backpack, you should place heavier items where?

choices.answer: Near the Top, Away from Your Body
In the Bottom, Near your Derriere
Near the Top, Near Your Body

questions.question: True of False: Internal backpacks should only be used indoors.
In addition to your personal gear, expect to also carry what in your backpack?

choices.answer: A portable charger for your iPhone
Some of your patrols equipment and food

questions.question: True or False: Cotton clothing is a better choice to pack than synthetic or wool clothing.
You should bring rain gear only if...

choices.answer: You have space in your pack
You are going on any campout or backpacking trip

questions.question: Which does NOT belong in your pack for a warm-weather backpacking campout?
Where is the best place to keep your rain gear on a backpacking trip?

choices.answer: Inside the pack under the rest of your gear to keep it dry
In an easily accessible place in your pack
Tied around your head like a blindfold

questions.question: Which of these items is LEAST appropriate for a backpacking campout?

choices.answer: A special water straw to filter out BPPs(butt pee particles)

questions.question: Which item for holding all your gear is NOT suitable for a backpacking campout?

choices.answer: Large "Hello Kitty" hiking day pack with a hipbelt

questions.question: Which is NOT suitable for packing in an easily-accessible space in your backpack?
Water weighs about how much per gallon?
When preparing a dehydrated backpacking "meal in a pouch", you should do what with the water?

choices.answer: Warm it then pour it in
Drink it then eat the dehydrated food
Bring to full boil it then pour it in
Dump it on your Scoutmasters head

questions.question: True or False: Dutch oven meals are not a good choice for a backpacking trip.
To clean your bowl on a backpacking trip, pour hot water in it, swirl it around, then what?

choices.answer: Dig a hole in the ground, and pour it in
Pour it out on the ground away from your campsite
Dump it on your Scoutmasters head

questions.question: A liter is about the same volume as what?
What should you do with the big orange thing on the bottom of the large JetBoil stoves?

choices.answer: Remove & use as a frisbee as you wait for the water to boil
Remove & set aside. It is used to protect the flux capacitor
Remove & set aside. It is used to protect the heat exchanger

questions.question: REI dehydrated meals for backpacking are the best choice because they cost the most.
